reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this place! The view is perfect, and I celebrated my birthday here, creating unforgettable memories that I’ll cherish till my last breath. However, one thing did disappoint me – the guard didn’t allow us to enter from the beach side, citing rules. While I understand rules are important, I kindly request the management to reconsider this policy for the comfort of customers who come directly from the beach. Overall, it was an amazing experience, but this small change could make it even better

"Romeo Lane Goa is an incredible nightclub that checks all the boxes for a fantastic night out! With amazing food, attentive staff, and top-notch hookah, it’s the perfect spot to unwind. The stunning views add to the overall vibe, making it a must-visit. Their New Year bash was nothing short of spectacular, with great energy and memorable celebrations. Highly recommended for party lovers!"

GOA party scene changes very frequently so you cant judge but for us it was a nice experience Except the Route, Parking and Entry. Route is very very very bad dont come in Rainy season. Parking has lot of issues. Entry is very very very strict. They remove your headache pills cigarettes everything even chewing gums even packed. Food is good but very costly. Space is not big. The DJ is good and the performance is great which actually sets the mood and it was fun. Crowd is pathetic now just like Thalassa. Come early by 10 and you ll get a seat and wont be chargeable entry. They are strict but they allow all kind of stags. Service was good and the waiters refuse the tip though there is a HEFTY SERVICE CHARGE on every item.
